title: Made mistake that changed meaning of Fatiha, should I repeat prayer? assim al hakeem JAL
transcript: abdullah from italy um i was praying a fat salad and then in the recitation of fatiha i made a mistake instead of being sort of laziness as a struggle lazy and a day after i remember that i made this mistake so should i repeat the salah or what should i do yes if you are certain that you have made such a mistake that changes the meaning of the fatiha you your prayer is invalid a levine is plural so guide us to this a straight path of those whom you have favored those if you said guide us to the straight path of that or of whom for a singular person you've changed the meaning definitely and the prayer is invalid and allah knows best you
